balanceOfPool().details: Must be implemented by the strategy

params._convexVault: The address of the convex vault
params._router: The address of the router for swapping tokens
params._stableSwap2Pool: The address of the stable swap pool
params._want: The desired token of the strategy

params._asset: The address of the token to withdraw

params._amount: The amount of the want token to withdraw

approveForSpender(address,address,uint25.notice: Approves a token address to be spent by an address

balanceOf().notice: Returns the strategy's balance of the want token plus the balance of pool

balanceOfPool().notice: Returns the balance of the pool

balanceOfWant().notice: Returns the balance of the want token on the strategy

deposit().notice: Deposits funds to the strategy's pool

harvest(uint256,uint256).notice: Harvest funds in the strategy's pool

setRouter(address).notice: Sets the address of the ISwap-compatible router

skim().notice: Sends stuck want tokens in the strategy to the controller

withdraw(address).notice: Sends stuck tokens in the strategy to the controller

withdraw(uint256).notice: Initiated from a vault, withdraws funds from the pool

withdrawAll().notice: Withdraws all funds from the strategy
